response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it will be equally beneficial to you. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,200,000, making it an excellent investment for you.

We understand that such a decision requires careful consideration, and we assure you that our product is worth every penny and more. It comes with unparalleled features and benefits that promise to enhance your experience significantly.

Should you choose to accept this offer, we guarantee a smooth transaction process and exceptional customer service throughout your journey with us. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for considering our offer. We look forward to the possibility of working with you soon.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
